linkLabel: Spara pengar på transport på Amalfikusten
intro: Practical ways to cut transport costs: passes, timing, mixing bus and ferry, and weather contingencies.

sections.title: Passes vs singles
body: Use day passes only if taking several rides; otherwise singles are cheaper. Validate tickets.

sections.title: Timing & routing
body: Travel outside 10:00–16:00 on peak days; prefer direct buses for ridges and ferries for scenic hops.

sections.title: Mixing bus and ferry
body: Choose one paid ferry leg (Positano ↔ Amalfi) and use buses elsewhere to save while staying comfortable.

sections.title: Weather contingency
body: Rough seas cancel ferries: have a bus-first backup and buffer the last sailing of the day.

a: Sometimes for multi-hop ferry days; compare against single fares.
